title: 2 Congressional Panels Probe Opiate Prescriptions At Wis. VA Hospital
teaser: Two congressional committees travel to the town of Tomah, Wisconsin, on Monday to hold a hearing on the VA hospital there. The hospital has been singled out for overprescribing opiates to vets. But the VA acknowledges that the problem is a national one.
